committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to remove a restriction from a parcel of land owned by the City of North Charleston, South Carolina, in order to permit a land exchange, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to execute instruments to remove specified restrictions to allow North Charleston, South Carolina, to exchange a certain parcel of land for: (1) a parcel to be used as a park or recreation area; and (2) sums to equalize the values of the parcels exchanged. Requires the city to use such sums only for park or recreation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to remove a restriction from a parcel of land owned by the City of North Charleston, South Carolina, in order to permit a land exchange, and for other purposes.
